domain.update.contracts

Interface IBasicObserver

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBasicUpdateProcessor, IObserver, IUpdateProcessor, IVisualizer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionInput, BasicUpdateProcessor, BoardSaver, CompositeAction, CompositeActionFly, CompositeActionFlyCatch, ForcedRemiseObserver, GameController, GraphicalVisualizer, InputProvider, OutOfMovesObserver, PromotionObserver, TextualVisualizer, UpdateProcessor, UpdatePropagator

    public interface IBasicObserver
    Implementers can observe the IGame by receiving IBoard and status updates. As such, the methods below are typically dispatched by an external source. Instances typically subscribe to classes that implement IBasicUpdateSource.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fireExecuteAction(IAction action)
      Indicates that the given Action has been executed.
      void fireSwitchPlayer(IReadOnlyBoard board, Player switchedIn)
      Indicates that it is now the given Player's turn.
      void fireUpdateBoard(IReadOnlyBoard board, Player performer)
      Indicates that the Board has been updated.

    • Method Detail

      • fireUpdateBoard

        void fireUpdateBoard(IReadOnlyBoard board,
                     Player performer)
        Indicates that the Board has been updated.
        Parameters:
        board - The board that has been updated.
        performer - The Player that initiated the Action that caused this update.

      • fireSwitchPlayer

        void fireSwitchPlayer(IReadOnlyBoard board,
                      Player switchedIn)
        Indicates that it is now the given Player's turn.
        Parameters:
        board - The current IBoard.
        switchedIn - The newly active Player.

      • fireExecuteAction

        void fireExecuteAction(IAction action)
        Indicates that the given Action has been executed.
        Parameters:
        action - The action that has been executed.
